name: Warehouse Blast
description:
Warehouse blast by The forkLIFTERS

 

You work in a warehouse. Your life is routine, the only surprises come from your boss, but most of the time you only deal with your mechanical coworkers. Most of the people left and you are dealing with drones all day long.

It is this one day where you wake up and know something is not right, while you obeyed in your hamster wheel. The chains must burst, to let go of the slavery. An accidental order of bombs are your little helpers, you have access to different kinds of explosives.

If you place them right, a chain reaction will blow up the whole warehouse. You will make your point. If nobody knows it was you, maybe you even get transferred to the other ware house…

Allegedly, there are human coworkers… lunchbreaks and even a breakroom with games.

Gameplay:

At the beginning there are 4 random points on the map where bombs are placed already. The player will place her or his bombs around this arrangement to find the most strategic way to generate the greatest impact/chain reaction: In the end, the biggest destruction will be the biggest reward.

How to Play:

Move: WASD and Arrow Keys

Pick up:  space
